title: Breakout from the Secret Laboratory
goal: Retrieve the sensitive information from the computer and escape the laboratory.

rooms.name: Computer Hub
rooms.description: A small, dark room illuminated only by the cold glow of several computer lock screens on the north wall. File cabinets stand against the east and west walls. The only exit is a doorway to the south leading into the laboratory.

items.name: locked computer
items.description: A high-security terminal displaying a password hint.
items.text: Password Hint: shift file info by 5

items.name: left file cabinet
items.description: A metal file cabinet with two drawers.

items.description: A metal file cabinet with two drawers.

items.description: A paper with encoded text.

items.description: A small USB drive used to download sensitive data once the computer is unlocked.

items.name: doorway to the lab
items.description: A simple opening leading to the laboratory.

rooms.name: The Lab
rooms.description: A pristine laboratory with white tables, shelves of equipment, and a poster about chemical safety on the wall. A massive metal door blocks the way to the south, held shut by thick wooden beams.

items.name: safety poster
items.description: A poster with a warning slogan.

items.name: wooden beams
items.description: Sturdy wooden beams barring the metal door. They look flammable with the right chemicals.

items.name: large metal door
items.description: A sealed metal exit door blocked by wooden beams.
items.puzzle_description: Burn the wooden beams using Boron, Uranium, and Radon.

items.name: table of chemicals
items.description: A metal table holding several beakers labeled with chemical names.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: A long, dark hallway. A hidden speaker crackles overhead.

items.name: booming voice
items.description: A voice from the ceiling asking a question.
items.question: What was the last chemical needed to escape?
items.success_effect: A ceiling tile slides open and a harness drops down for extraction.

rooms.win_message: You made it out of the lab with the information and without being caught! You win!
